response.overview: Titanic-Vals is a Romanian film released in 1965, directed and written by Paul Călinescu, based on the play of the same name by Tudor Mușatescu. The film depicts the fate of an ordinary and honest man who is unwillingly drawn into the electoral turmoil of interwar Romanian political life, which manipulates him, making him a victim. The film remains a landmark in Romanian cinema.
response.title: Titanic Vals
